title.value: Сочетаемость хряков и маток заводского типа 'Заднепровский' по репродуктивным качествам при внутрилинейном подборе и кроссах линий
Compatibility of male and female pigs of the breed type 'Zadneprovskij' by reproductive qualities during the intralinear selection and cross-breeding lines
Compatibility of male and female pigs of the breed type 'Zadneprovskij' by reproductive qualities during the intralinear selection and cross-breeding lines

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Chernov, A.S., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Compatibility of boars and sows of Zadneprovsky type on reproductive qualities at interline selection and cross lines was studied in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. On results of leaded researches it has been established, that compatibility of animals of production type 'Zadneprovsky' renders the big influence on reproductive qualities of sows. The best combinations of male pigs and females on reproductive qualities in view of a linear (group) belonging are revealed, and according to this the optimum scheme of selection of boars and sows of Zadneprovsky type on reproductive qualities with allowance for linear (group) accessory was developed. Application of the given selection scheme provides the increase of polycarpic effect on 0,4-1,0 pigs (Р 0,05; Р 0,01; Р 0,001), milkiness - on 1,5-2,4 kg (Р 0,01; Р 0,001), quantity of pigs at weaning - on 0,3-0,4 heads (Р 0,05; Р 0,01), weight of pigs at weaning - on 1,7-4,8 kg (Р 0,01; Р 0,001).
